text: Black Tape is the second full-length album from The Explosion. It was released in the United States on October 15, 2004 on Virgin Records. The band released a music video for the lead single "Here I Am" and "No Revolution". The song "No Revolution" was featured in NFL Street 2 and Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition. "Here I Am" was also featured in Burnout 3: Takedown, Tony Hawk's Underground 2, and Cars (The Cars version is an instrumental). == Track listing == #"Deliver Us" – 1:42 #"Filthy Insane" – 3:08 #"Here I Am" – 2:47 #"I Know" – 3:34 #"We All Fall Down" – 2:57 #"Mothers Cry" – 3:14 #"Atrocity" – 3:20 #"Go Blank" – 3:21 #"No Revolution" – 2:46 #"Heavyweight" – 3:24 #"Grace" – 3:40 #"Hollywood Sign" – 3:06 ===Japanese bonus tracks=== #"Black Tuesday" #"Jeffrey Lee" ==Personnel== Category:2004 albums Category:The Explosion albums
title: Black Tape
